summary: REQ-1 is implemented in AppLayout: a mobile-only hamburger Button using the specified asset is placed directly next to the FourleafBrand in a left-aligned cluster, with the LoginButton remaining right-aligned and the click handler still opening the mobile sidebar.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated internal tracking/metadata files (feature request registry/status) unrelated to the requested UI placement change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a header UI placement adjustment and explicitly constrains scope to UI placement without broader changes; updating project tracking files is not requested behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated generated/summary documentation file not required for the UI change.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the stated requirement or acceptance criteria; appears to be ancillary documentation rather than implementing the header change itself.
